original_text: So although I wrote to you, it was not for the sake of the one who did the wrong, nor for the sake of the one who suffered the wrong, but in order that your earnestness for us might be revealed to you in the sight of God.
korean_text: 그런즉 내가 너희에게 쓴 것은 그 불의를 행한 자를 위한 것도 아니요 그 불의를 당한 자를 위한 것도 아니요 오직 우리를 위한 너희의 간절함이 하나님 앞에서 너희에게 나타나게 하려 함이로라

sentences.original_text: So although I wrote to you
it was not for the sake of the one who did the wrong
nor for the sake of the one who suffered the wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 잘못을 당한 자를 위함도 아니었으나

sentences.original_text: but in order that your earnestness for us
